thread.title: Former congressman says DFS is "cauldron of daily betting"

title: Former congressman says DFS is "cauldron of daily betting"
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Politics - Today 
The U.S. congressman who drafted the 2006 legislation used by DraftKings and FanDuel as proof of their legitimacy says is it "sheer chutzpah...
